attributes.action: Sumo.tv has a share in the BBC licence fee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As SUMO.tv shows user generated content and is currently only available on SKY it should have a share of the TV licence fee. This would allow it to broadcast on freeview and it truly represents what people want to see as the viewers are the ones that produce the content.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
